song.title: More About Jesus
song.lyrics:
[1] More about Jesus would I know, More of His grace to others show; More of his saving fullness see, More of His love who died for me.
[C] Refrain: More, more about Jesus, More, more about Jesus; More of His saving fullness see, More of His love who died for me.
[2] More about Jesus let me learn, More of his holy will discern; Spirit of God, my teacher be, Showing the things of Christ to me. [B] [Refrain]
[3] More about Jesus in His Word, Holding communion with my Lord; Hearing his voice in ev'ry line, Making each faithful saying mine. [B] [Refrain]
[4] More about Jesus on his throne, Riches in glory all His own; More if His kingdom's sure increase; More of His coming, Prince of peace. [B] [Refrain]
